# preferredInputNumberOfChannels

**Instance Property**

The preferred number of input channels for the current route.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredInputNumberOfChannels: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property indicates the number of channels selected using the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/setPreferredInputNumberOfChannels(_:)] method.

To determine the actual number of input channels, query the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/inputNumberOfChannels] property.

## Setting the number of input channels

- **setPreferredInputNumberOfChannels(_:)**: Sets the preferred number of input channels for the current route.
- **inputNumberOfChannels**: The number of audio input channels for the current route.
- **maximumInputNumberOfChannels**: The maximum number of input channels available for the current audio route.
